Class ImagingService

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.onvifptz.Service

    • setIris

      public String setIris(String vToken, String value) throws IOException
      Sets the iris attenuation
      Parameters:
      vToken - reference token to the relevant video source
      value - the requested iris attenuation; "auto", "manual", or a float
      Throws:
      IOException
